channel.title: Error with ::item and pickup wont sapwn new item

item.title: Error with ::item and pickup wont sapwn new item
item.dc:creator: @vipersniper100 vipersniper100
item.description:
@vipersniper100 wrote:

here replace the “Pickup” command with this
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 3)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
}
}

item.title: Error with ::item and pickup wont sapwn new item
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

Heres the codes but i cant get them to work , i dont get an error on compile

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“0 X PK X 0”) || playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Excist”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! ");
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“item”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“0 X PK X 0”) || playerRights >= 2))
{
try{
addItem(Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)), 1);
}catch(Exception e){
sendMessage(e.toString());
}
}[/code]
heres error pix, on the client
